snippet: Members of the jury deciding the fate of David Tarloff, who is charged with killing a psychologist, could be heard yelling whenever a door to their meeting room was opened.
abstract: Jurors in murder trial of David Tarloff, schizophrenic man charged with killing New York City psychologist Kathryn Faughey in 2008, say they are deadlocked on the seventh day of deliberations; Justice Edward J McLaughlin orders the jury to continue deliberating.
lead_paragraph: Members of the jury deciding the fate of David Tarloff, who is charged with killing a psychologist, could be heard yelling whenever a door to their meeting room was opened.

headline.seo: Jurors Are Deadlocked in Murder Trial of David Tarloff
